title: SLA Attainment Report at Tenant Level
description: In addition to providing global SLA performance, Microsoft Entra ID reports tenant-level SLA performance for organizations with at least 5,000 monthly active users. This feature entered general availability in May 2024. The Service Level Agreement (SLA) sets a minimum bar of 99.99% for the availability of Microsoft Entra ID user authentication, reported on a monthly basis in the Microsoft Entra admin center. For more information, see Learn about Microsoft Entra Health - Microsoft Entra ID | Microsoft Learn .
